items.sentence: You know Tom is afraid to do that, don't you?
You know Tom can't swim very well, don't you?
You knew Tom was a ballet dancer, didn't you?
You do know Tom and Mary broke up, don't you?
You didn't know Tom used to do that, did you?
You should just let Tom cry himself to sleep.
You don't really think Tom does that, do you?
You and Tom didn't do that together, did you?
You need to do that more carefully next time.
You looked like you were hesitant to do that.
You looked like you were finished doing that.
You have to do that more carefully next time.
You could've left earlier if you'd wanted to.
You were planning on helping us, weren't you?
You still plan on taking pictures, don't you?
You don't really need to lose weight, do you?
You don't know when Tom will do that, do you?
You coat is dirty. You should get it cleaned.
You don't allow your kids to do that, do you?
You don't seem to be aware that Tom did that.
